metadata.title: CVE-2017-0397 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An information disclosure vulnerability in id3/ID3.cpp in libstagefright inMediaserver could enable a local malicious application to access dataoutside of its permission levels. This issue is rated as Moderate becauseit could be used to access sensitive data without permission. Product:Android. Versions: 4.4.4, 5.0.2, 5.1.1, 6.0, 6.0.1, 7.0, 7.1. Android ID:A-32377688.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
